comment: A very kind professor. Remain respectful and patient and you will be surprised about the new material you will learn!

Professor Bingol brings a unique and vital perspective to the classroom that no other educator could. His vast and immense knowledge and experiences, enhance education beyond measure. He makes learning dynamic and entertaining. He is fascinating, quite clever, really funny, and very nice.  He is an utterly brilliant, kind, and handsome young man.
I like the way he challenges us to think and learn. His lectures are my favorite. He cares for his students.

He is one of the smartest professors at KSU and he knows so much that it is hard to keep up with him all the time. He is very scattered when he lectures so taking notes is impossible. He tests on concepts so just do your research, pay attention and talk to him. He's a nice guy and will do anything for students.

Prof Bingol is unlike any professor I've had before and I wish that there were more like him. He likes his job and he cares for his students by taking time to talk to each of them out of class. He is also the first teacher to actually make me want to try harder and not have to. He is tough but understanding when it comes to grades.  I recommend.
He is really helpful and he always helped when I asked. He cares for his students, and his lectures are really cool.

Professor Bingol is a very nice professor. He loves to talk about and compare other nations to the turkish an the kurdish.  Quizzes & test are fairly easy. One country term paper throughout the semester
